name: SPACETUNNEL
description:
SPACETUNNEL is a game for the 2nd Vaulticular gamejam made in 2 days instead of 2 weeks haha. It's very buggy and I'll apreciate if you could tell me some bugs and future things I'll add. A update will come adding more content and making the game more enjoyable, but for now this is it. Enjoy!

HOW TO PLAY:

- the game is played using a mouse and keyboard.

- W A S D to move Left Click to shoot.

-blast the doors and go as far as you can taking one of the 3 power ups: the bomber, the shield or the dual wield!
